title: Google\Cloud\Domains\V1alpha2\DnsSettings\CustomDns
name: CustomDns
description:
Configuration for an arbitrary DNS provider.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.domains.v1alpha2.DnsSettings.CustomDns

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name_servers
params.description: Required. A list of name servers that store the DNS zone for this domain. Each name server is a domain name, with Unicode domain names expressed in Punycode format.

params.name: data.ds_records
params.description: The list of DS records for this domain, which are used to enable DNSSEC. The domain's DNS provider can provide the values to set here. If this field is empty, DNSSEC is disabled.
